title: Wiring Systems
fullText: Wiring systems should be installed outside the zones, i.e., on the cold side of the thermal insulation. If the wiring system is installed in Zone 1 or 3, i.e., on the warm side of the thermal insulation, it shall be heat-resistant, in accordance with Clause 6.5.4.2(c). Metallic sheaths and metallic conduits shall not be accessible in normal use. NOTE: Examples of suitable wiring systems are insulated, unsheathed cables in non-metallic enclosures or sheathed cables.
